Adam?
Look.
Look.

Christ, Katie.
-It's a little personal, don't you think? -I was upset.

What are you doing?
I'm calling him. We can't keep this. He has to write us another check.

translation.en: By the time we drive back to the house and he writes another check,
translation.ko: 그 집으로 돌아가서 수표 새로 받을 때쯤에는

translation.en: the bank will be closed.
If we don't pay these bills by today, Katie, they'll be kicking in our door.
translation.ko: 이 청구서들 오늘까지 갚지 못하면 케이티, 우리 집에 추심단이 쳐들어올 거야

All right, look,
why don't we...
deposit the check--
-We cannot take this money. -It's just for tonight.

[Adam] What's Leonard's deal, anyway?

No.

Leonard?
Leonard?
Leonard?

We shouldn't.
I'm just gonna look.
Katie.

translation.en: We shouldn't do this.
All right.
Let's go.
We need to call 911.
Holy!

Why should we let it get caught up in the system like that?

Well, there you have it.
A way for him to help you.
Help us.

Adam.

he's 88, so he took a lot of medication but...

No?
No.

just give me a call.

Let me get back to you.
Okay.

At the agency.
For another position.
Why?
Because that's what I should do,

If there's anything I can do...

UNKNOWN
Hello?
Speaking.

Thank you for calling.

translation.en: Investigation?

Hello?

I'm just sick of being poor.
Who was it, Adam?

translation.en: -Sometime before you started. -Leonard talked about hiring a gardener,

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: What if they come back?
[cashier] All right, right this way.

Thank you.
[Adam] Babe.
[Adam] Dinner's on me.

Ms. Franklin, this is Detective Chesler. We spoke at Mr. Wellsley's house.

Sorry to keep you waiting. Thanks for coming in.

translation.en: Detective. Is there a problem?

And no family?
He was all alone.
Well, something like this,

translation.en: I'm sorry, Detective.
[stammers] I don't...
What is this about?
Well, you said that Mr. Wellsley asked to be cremated.

translation.en: So I'm assuming that you want to honor his request.

translation.en: Yes.
Yes, we do.
Without a family and no will,

translation.en: We'll take care of Leonard.
Okay. I've got the paperwork right here.
[Adam] What's that?
[Katie] His favorite tea.
Thanks.
For Leonard.
Leonard.
We should put the money back.
It doesn't feel right.
Let's just be here.
For Leonard.
[Katie] We should say something.
"And he shall be like a tree,
planted by the rivers of water.
That bringeth forth his fruit in his season
and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper."
I'm sorry. Who are you?
Apologies, Ms. Franklin. My name is Julia Byron-Kim.

translation.en: I'm Mr. Wellsley's attorney.
Ms. Byron-Kim,
Leonard never said anything about an attorney.
translation.ko: 레너드 씨에게 변호사 얘기를 들은 적은 한 번도 없어서요

translation.en: Please, call me Julia. And I'm not surprised.

translation.en: [Adam] What do you mean?

translation.ko: 제가 웰슬리를 처음 뵌 게 불과 몇 주 전이거든요

-I never saw you here. -He was very specific about that.

-Oh, my God! -Congratulations.
[laughing] Oh, my God!

Wow.

Byron was his favorite poet.
Ms. Byron-Kim.

translation.en: but I could really use your help.
There are some big changes coming your way.
I hope you're ready.
Me too.
And how about Adam?

Well, he does understand that legally,
translation.ko: 남편분께서 법적인 부분을 잘 아신다고 해도

translation.en: where it comes to this house, you make all the decisions.
translation.ko: 이 집에 관해서는 케이티 씨가 스스로 결정하도록 하세요

translation.en: We've always decided things together.
translation.ko: 저희는 뭐든 항상 같이 결정해 왔어요

translation.en: Which is how it should be.
These things, you just never know how it can change someone.
translation.ko: 다만 이런 일들은 사람을 어떻게 바꿔 놓을지 모를 일이라서요

translation.en: We'll be okay.
Good.
-Leave it to me then. -Great.
-Congratulations. -Thanks.
We should take a vacation for a month. Just first class all the way.
translation.ko: 한 달 동안 휴가 가자, 우리 전 구간 일등석 타고

translation.en: You'll get your MBA before you know it. Find a great job.
translation.ko: 자기는 당장 MBA 따서 좋은 직장 잡아

translation.en: -That piece of junk that we drive. -We can pay off everything.
translation.ko: - 우리 자동차 완전 고물이야 - 전부 다 갚을 수 있겠다

translation.en: Credit cards, loans, just wipe the slate clean.
translation.ko: 신용카드, 대출금 그냥 싹 다 갚아 버리는 거야

translation.en: You know, we should go right now. Both of us. Just go pick brand new cars.
translation.ko: 지금 당장 우리 둘 다 새 차 한 대씩 뽑자

translation.en: -Come on, Adam. I'm serious. -Yeah, me too.
translation.ko: - 그만해, 애덤, 나 진지해 - 응, 나도 그래

translation.en: -We can't do that. -Why not? We have the money.
translation.ko: - 그러면 안 되지 - 왜? 우리 돈이 있는데

translation.en: We can't just walk in there with all that cash. It'll look weird.
translation.ko: 자동차 매장 가서 돈다발 내밀면 다들 이상하게 여길 거야

translation.en: -People are gonna ask questions. -Yeah. No. You're right.
translation.ko: 이것저것 물어보겠지 그래, 안 되겠네 당신 말이 맞아

translation.en: I did some research online and been looking into that.
translation.ko: 내가 인터넷 검색으로 조사해 본 게 있는데 말야

translation.en: Into what?
See there's ways we can make it work, right? We just spread the money around.
translation.ko: 쓸 수 있게 만들 방법이 있더라고 돈을 여러 군데 분산시키는 거야

translation.en: Different banks, different kinds of accounts.
translation.ko: 다 다른 은행 다른 계좌에 넣는 거지

translation.en: What are you talking about?
If we do this right, it's like nobody will ever know.
We can get away with so much in taxes.
Adam.
We still have to be careful.
We have been careful, okay?
Don't you think it's time for us to treat ourselves?
translation.ko: 이제 우리도 좀 누려야 하지 않겠어?

translation.en: You earned it.
God knows I have.
I mean maybe you're right, but we have to settle in first,
translation.ko: 자기 말이 맞을 수도 있지만 우선 자리 잡고 적응해야지

translation.en: take things slow, you know. Just...
Just a little while longer. Okay?
translation.ko: 그냥 조금 더 시간을 두자, 응?

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay.
We'll take it slow.
I'll call the movers. See how soon we can get them over here.
translation.ko: 이삿짐센터에 연락했어 얼마나 빨리 와 줄 수 있나 하고

translation.en: What? We don't need any of this stuff.
translation.ko: 뭐? 이런 물건은 하나도 필요 없잖아

translation.en: What? It's our stuff. We've had it since we got married.
translation.ko: 뭐야? 우리들 물건이잖아 결혼할 때부터 썼던 살림이야

translation.en: Yeah well, here, we'll keep the pictures and some of those books,
translation.ko: 그래, 그러니까 여기, 사진이랑 책이나 좀 챙기면 되지

translation.en: and we don't need the rest of this junk.
What are we supposed to do with all of it?
translation.ko: 그러면 이 물건들 다 어떻게 하려고?

translation.en: Just leave it for the next poor losers that have to live in this dump, right?
translation.ko: 그냥 놔두고 가면 다음에 들어오는 가난뱅이 입주자가 알아서 쓰겠지

translation.en: -Jeez, Adam. -[phone rings]
Hello?
Yeah, that was five months ago and I already gave the police my statement.
translation.ko: 네, 그건 5개월 전 일이고 저는 이미 경찰서에 진술서 제출했는데요

translation.en: Who was it who called you, sir?
I didn't get the name. He just said talk to someone at the front desk.
translation.ko: 성함은 못 들었는데 그냥 접수처에 말하라고 하셨어요

translation.en: I got nothing.
Mr. Kettner, everything okay?
He says somebody told him to come down, make a statement.
translation.ko: 서에 방문해서 진술서를 작성하라는 요청을 받으셨대요

translation.en: What's this regarding?
Like five months ago somebody robbed the Smile Diner, killed somebody.
translation.ko: 5개월 전에 스마일 다이너에서 일어났던 강도 살인 사건요

translation.en: You were at the diner that night?
Yes.
Lucky you didn't get hurt.
I kinda stopped the guy.
You did?
Yeah, in that situation, I reacted. My wife was working that night so...
translation.ko: 네, 돌발 상황에 반사적으로 그랬죠 아내가 근무하던 밤이라...

translation.en: Ms. Franklin was there too?
Yeah, but what I don't understand is you already have the guy locked up.
translation.ko: 네, 그런데 이해가 안 되는 게 강도를 이미 검거했는데도

translation.en: Why do they need another statement?
translation.ko: 왜 또 다른 진술서가 필요한 거죠?

translation.en: They don't.
What are you talking about?
That guy from the diner, Ray Gaskin.
translation.ko: 그 식당 강도 이름이 레이 개스킨이던가 그렇죠

translation.en: -Yeah. -He's dead.
Somebody stabbed him in his cell a couple weeks ago.
So who called me?
Kind of wondering that myself.
Excuse me?
Hello, Katie. Do you remember me?
Yeah, what are you doing back here?
translation.ko: 네, 그런데 이 뒤에서 뭐 하고 계세요?

translation.en: I know, a pain in the ass, right? But my client, he's driving me nuts.
translation.ko: 그게 참 골치 아프네요 저희 고객분께서 하도 저를 못살게 굴어서요

translation.en: He just-- He absolutely loves the place. I think he wants to make an offer.
translation.ko: 그분께서는 이 집이 너무나 마음에 드신다네요 제 생각으로는 구매 제안서를 넣으실 거 같아요

translation.en: I told you already.
It's not for sale.
Maybe, if I could speak with the owner myself,
translation.ko: 주인 되시는 분과 제가 직접 얘기를 나눠 보면

translation.en: at least I can say I tried.
translation.ko: 저도 일단 시도는 해 봤다 싶을 텐데요

translation.en: Look, I'm really busy and you can't just show up here like this, so...
translation.ko: 저기, 제가 너무 바쁘거든요 이렇게 막 들어오시면 안 되죠 여기 이렇게, 그러니까...

translation.en: I want you to go now. Please.
You know, Katie?
This ain't my first rodeo.
You know, one of the first lessons in real estate...
translation.ko: 부동산 일을 하게 되면 가장 먼저 배우는 게...

translation.en: if you want to find new listings,
check the obituaries.
I know all about the late Mr. Wellsley.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 다 알고 왔어요 고인이 되신 웰슬리 씨에 대해서는 말이죠

translation.en: Sad.
The house isn't for sale.
You know, I've had my eye on this house for a couple years.
translation.ko: 내가 이 집을 몇 년 동안이나 지켜봤는데

translation.en: The old man...
kicks the bucket...
and you think you can just move in?
translation.ko: 댁이 그냥 이사 들어올 수 있을 거 같아요?

translation.en: I'm gonna smile?
Wish you well?
I own the house now.
What the hell are you saying?
Leonard left it to me.
I have his will, I can prove it.
Yeah, well for five grand
translation.ko: 그렇군요, 5천 달러만 내면 나도 새 유언장 만들 수 있는데

translation.en: I can make a new will that says it belongs to my dear Aunt Myrtle.
translation.ko: 그렇군요, 5천 달러만 내면 나도 새 유언장 만들 수 있는데 이 집 상속인은 우리 머틀 고모로 해서요

translation.en: I have a lawyer.
Of course you do.
If you have any more questions, I suggest you talk to her
translation.ko: 더 궁금한 점 있으면 내 변호사랑 얘기해요

translation.en: but, in the meantime, get the hell off my property before I call the police.
translation.ko: 우선 당장은 경찰 부르기 전에 내 땅에서 꺼지고요

translation.en: All right. Well, I guess I'll see you around, Katie.
translation.ko: 그래요, 그럼 우리 자주 만나요, 케이티 씨

translation.en: He's just messing with you.
It's not how it sounded.
He practically accused me of forging the will.
translation.ko: 거의 내가 유언장을 위조하기라도 한 것처럼 몰아세우더라고

translation.en: Babe, trust me.
The thing this guy cares about is what he's losing on commission.
translation.ko: 그 남자는 복비 못 받을 생각에 신경이 곤두선 거야

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to Julia.
The lawyer?
Why?
In case Hayden tries to make trouble?
What could he do?
I don't know but it's like she said, we don't want any surprises right now.
translation.ko: 잘은 모르겠지만 변호사 말대로 지금 우리에게는 뜻밖의 일이 생기면 안 되잖아

translation.en: Katie.
This guy is just pissed off. Forget about him.
translation.ko: 그 남자는 그냥 화가 난 거야 잊어 버려

translation.en: Come on.
It's our first night in our new house.
We should celebrate.
Yeah?
What did you have in mind?
I can think of something.
-Let me take a shower first. -What?
I've been cleaning the house all day. I'll be right out.
translation.ko: 나 하루 종일 집 청소했어 금방 나올게

translation.en: What is this?
My old one stopped working, so...
Looks expensive.
Well, it's a knock off.
Just bought it from some guy downtown.
Very convincing.
You want company?
I'll be right out.
Detective!
-Looks like I came at a bad time. -No, you're fine. Come in.
translation.ko: - 하필 바쁜데 내가 왔네요 - 아니에요, 괜찮아요, 들어오세요

translation.en: You folks going somewhere?
Yeah, we're moving, actually, into Leonard's house.
translation.ko: 네, 그게 실은 레너드 씨 댁으로 이사 가요

translation.en: Leonard?
As in Mr. Wellsley?
I know. I'm still getting used to the idea myself.
translation.ko: 네, 저도 아직 실감이 잘 안 나요

translation.en: Leonard left it to me in his will.
translation.ko: 레너드 씨가 유언장을 통해 그 집을 제게 남겨 주셨어요

translation.en: Now then, that is a very nice house.
Yes, it is.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
So, a thing like that, what do they call it?
A windfall.
Doesn't happen every day.
Nope.
Funny you forgot to mention it.
translation.ko: 이런 걸 깜박하고 나한테 말하지 않았다니 우습네요

translation.en: What?
The will, and all, when we spoke.
translation.ko: 유언이랑 그런 거요 우리 얘기 나눴잖아요

translation.en: I asked you about his family, about a will.
translation.ko: 고인에게 가족은 있는지 유언장은 있는지 내가 물었죠

translation.en: Oh no, I didn't know about it until after the service. His lawyer came by.
translation.ko: 아, 그런 거 아니에요 장례식 때까지 몰랐어요 그분 변호사가 오셨거든요

translation.en: That must've been quite a shock.
Yeah, it was.
I'd have loved to see the look on your face.
translation.ko: 그때 케이티 씨가 놀란 표정을 나도 봤으면 좋았을 텐데

translation.en: You know, I mean you worked there for...
translation.ko: 그 집에서 일한 기간이 얼마나 된다고...

translation.en: what did you say? Four months?
Why are you here, Detective?
I was hoping to speak with your husband.
He's not here.
Well, maybe you can help me.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 케이티 씨가 도움이 될 수도 있어요

translation.en: See, I was wondering
when you worked nights at that place, the Smile Diner,
translation.ko: 케이티 씨가 스마일 다이너에서 야간 근무하던 때요

translation.en: did he pick you up all the time?
I mean, he picked you up before.
translation.ko: 내 말은, 남편분께서 데리러 가곤 했잖아요

translation.en: Yeah.
Right, but was it a set thing?
Was it every night, was it certain nights?
translation.ko: 매일 밤 그랬나요? 아니면 가끔씩만 그랬나요?

translation.en: No, not exactly.
So how did he happen to be there that night?
translation.ko: 그날 밤은 무슨 연유로 남편분이 거기 계셨죠?

translation.en: I-- I called him to pick me up and he came early to study.
translation.ko: 제가, 제가 데리러 와달라고 전화를 해서 그이가 일찍 와서 공부하며 기다렸어요

translation.en: Well, you ought to play the lottery, Katie.
translation.ko: 와, 케이티 씨는 꼭 복권을 사야겠네요

translation.en: You're a very lucky woman.
Does this have anything to do with the fact that
translation.ko: 지금 이거 혹시 일전에 경찰이 애덤에게 전화와서

translation.en: the police called Adam about making another statement?
translation.ko: 추가 진술서 요청했던 일이랑 관련이 있나요?

translation.en: He didn't tell you?
Police never called Adam.
No, I was here. They called him down at the station.
translation.ko: 아니에요 저도 여기 있었어요 그이가 방문해 달라는 경찰 전화를 받았는걸요

translation.en: No, I checked it out after he left.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 남편분이 떠난 후에 제가 확인해 봤는데

translation.en: There's no record of any calls to his number.
translation.ko: 남편분 번호로 발신된 전화 내역은 전혀 없었어요

translation.en: That doesn't make any sense. Why would-- Why would anyone...
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼요, 대체 누가 왜 그런 전화를 걸어서...

translation.en: send him down there for no reason?
Well, maybe they had a reason.
translation.ko: 그래야 하는 이유가 있었을 수도 있죠

translation.en: Maybe it's just not the one you think.
translation.ko: 단지 케이티의 생각이 미치지 않는 걸지도 몰라요

translation.en: Take care now.
[Katie] Thanks, Julia. I'll talk to you later, bye.
translation.ko: 고마워요, 줄리아 씨 또 연락할게요, 잘 가요

translation.en: Katie.
What did she want?
I called her, actually.
What did you tell her?
Nothing.
That's not how it looked.
Looked like you guys were best friends all of a sudden.
translation.ko: 갑자기 둘이 아주 절친된 것처럼 보이던데

translation.en: Well, maybe if you'd been here,
maybe if you'd answered your phone...
We agreed.
We decided you were not going to talk to her.
No, you decided.
Like you've been deciding a lot of things lately.
translation.ko: 요즘은 이것저것 다 자기 혼자 결정한 게 많잖아

translation.en: What are you even talking about?
Why didn't you tell me that it wasn't the police who called you?
translation.ko: 왜 나한테 말 안 했어? 자기에게 전화했던 게 경찰이 아니더라는 얘기 말이야

translation.en: It was somebody else who made sure you went down there, right?
translation.ko: 다른 누군가가 당신을 거기로 불러낸 거야, 맞지?

translation.en: Who told you that?
Detective Chesler dropped by.
And she was asking a lot of questions,
about you,
about what happened the night of the diner.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 식당에서 있었던 일에 대해서도

translation.en: What is that about,
Adam?
[scoffs] How should I know?
Who called?
-Who sent you to the police station? -I don't know!
translation.ko: - 경찰서로 자기 부른 게 누구야? - 나도 몰라!

translation.en: My bad, I was gonna tell you about it.
translation.ko: 당신에게 말하지 않은 건 내 잘못이야

translation.en: It's a whole lot of other stuff has been happening right now.
translation.ko: 하지만 요즘 이런저런 일이 너무 많이 벌어지잖아

translation.en: What other stuff?
I think I'm being followed.
What?
I kind of had the feeling before.
Today, I just went driving around, just around.
translation.ko: 오늘은 내가 그냥 차로 빙빙 돌아봤거든

translation.en: I kept seeing the same car.
Did you go to the bank?
-Come on, we said we would not do that. -No, Adam. No bullshit.
translation.ko: - 우리 그러지 않기로 했잖아 - 아니, 애덤, 허튼소리 하지 마

translation.en: Just tell me. Did you go to the bank today?
translation.ko: 그냥 대답만 해 자기 오늘 은행에 갔었어?

translation.en: Did you take money out?
I noticed him.
So I figured, you know,
it wouldn't be a good idea. Just in case.
translation.ko: 그러면 안 될 거란 생각이 들었지 혹시 모를 일이니까

translation.en: In case he was after the money.
translation.ko: 행여 그놈이 돈을 쫓는 걸 수도 있잖아

translation.en: -We don't know that. -Why else is he watching you?
translation.ko: 그건 모를 일이지 그게 아니라면 뭐 하러 자기를 미행하겠어?

translation.en: Look, maybe I'm just paranoid.
translation.ko: 그냥 내가 너무 예민한 걸 수도 있지

translation.en: Okay? Maybe there's nobody who's following me. I don't know.
translation.ko: 안 그래? 실제로는 날 쫓는 놈이 전혀 없는 걸지도 모르잖아

translation.en: You got sent down to the police station, Adam.
That way, I'm here alone.
translation.ko: 그러면 난 여기 혼자 있게 된다고

translation.en: That way, Hayden shows up, tries to intimidate me,
translation.ko: 그러면 헤이든 그자가 나타나서 날 위협할 수도 있지

translation.en: scare us out of the house. What is that? Why is he here?
translation.ko: 집 밖에서 우리를 두렵게 만들 수도 있고, 이게 다 뭐야? 그놈은 왜 여기 오는데?

translation.en: Because he probably knows.
translation.ko: 아마 뭐 아는 게 있나 보지

translation.en: I warned you.
Chesler.
Hey, Tom.
You did?
Great.
Great, okay. Hold on.
All right, so probably just from the last four, five months.
translation.ko: 됐어요, 그러니까 지난 네댓 달의 기록만 보면 돼요

translation.en: We're looking for any checks drawn on an account from a Leonard Wellsley.
translation.ko: 레너드 웰슬리 씨의 계좌에서 발행된 수표는 전부 다 봐야죠

translation.en: Yeah, made out to her name.
translation.ko: 네, 특정 여자 이름으로 발행된 거요

translation.en: Yeah.
It's Kate... Franklin.
Listen, can you see what you got on the husband too?
translation.ko: 혹시 남편 것도 봐 줄 수 있어요?

translation.en: It's a different last name.
It's an Adam Kettner with a "K."
translation.ko: 애덤 케트너라고 하는데 성은 K로 시작해요

translation.en: Great, get back to me as soon as you can. Thanks.
What are you looking for?
Leonard didn't just stash that money.
translation.ko: 레너드 씨가 그냥 그 돈을 숨겨 놓은 건 아닐 거야

translation.en: It had to come from somewhere. There has to be a reason.
translation.ko: 어디로부터인가 들어온 돈이겠지 분명 무슨 이유가 있을 거야

translation.en: Does that even matter now?
Julia said...
if they find out we've been hiding something illegal,
translation.ko: 우리가 불법적인 걸 숨긴 게 발각되면

translation.en: we could lose everything.
All right.
So what do you suggest? We just give it all back?
translation.ko: 그래서 어떻게 하고 싶은데? 그냥 전부 다 돌려줄래?

translation.en: I don't know.
Yeah, maybe.
-To whom, Katie? -I don't know!
translation.ko: - 누구에게 돌려줄 건데, 케이티? - 나도 몰라!

translation.en: But this never felt right.
translation.ko: 하지만 절대 이러면 안 될 거 같아

translation.en: I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.ko: 나는 예전 우리 삶으로 돌아가진 않을 거야

translation.en: Adam.
We may not have a choice.
translation.ko: 우리에겐 선택의 여지가 없을 수도 있어

translation.en: We always have a choice.
I had absolutely no idea that Mr. Wellsley left Katie the house.
translation.ko: 저는 전혀 몰랐어요 웰슬리 씨가 케이티에게 집을 남겨 줬다니

translation.en: That seems a little...
excessive.
Doesn't it, though?
What can you tell me about her husband?
I've never met the man.
So you had nothing to do with hiring him?
As a gardener at the house.
No. It's strictly against our policy for family members to work together.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 가족 구성원과 함께 일하는 건 저희 방침에 크게 어긋납니다

translation.en: Our patients are elderly, infirm.
We can't risk that kind of potential distraction.
translation.ko: 도우미의 주의력에 지장을 줄 수도 있는 위험은 감수하지 않아요

translation.en: So, do you know of Ms. Franklin ever breaking the rules before?
translation.ko: 프랭클린 씨가 전에도 규칙을 어긴 적이 있나요?

translation.en: Never, no.
No, she absolutely understood the importance of her job, especially...
translation.ko: 케이티는 자기 업무의 중요성을 아주 잘 파악하고 있었어요

translation.en: with Mr. Wellsley.
Why especially him?
Well, you wouldn't have known it to look at him, but his health was very delicate.
translation.ko: 겉으로는 티가 나지 않아도 그분의 건강 상태는 꽤 허약했거든요

translation.en: You know, Katie told me, she kept a notebook,
translation.ko: 케이티 말로는 자기가 공책을 갖고 다니면서

translation.en: like, a daily log, just to keep track of his medication.
translation.ko: 웰슬리 씨가 복용한 약을 기록하는 일지를 쓴다더군요

translation.en: Do you happen to have a record of his medications?
translation.ko: 웰슬리 씨가 복용하던 약물 목록은 갖고 계신가요?

translation.en: You'd have to speak with his doctor about that.
Right. How about Ms. Franklin's contract, how much she was being paid?
translation.ko: 그러죠, 프랭클린 씨의 계약상 임금은 얼마였는지 아세요?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, we can get that to you.
translation.ko: 네, 당연하죠 그건 알려 드릴 수 있어요

translation.en: -Yeah. -Excellent. Thank you. And let me...
just ask you. Did she...
Did she ever mention a raise?
translation.ko: 플랭클린 씨가 임금을 올려 받았단 말 하던가요?

translation.en: Good lord.
She deposited that check just before Wellsley died.
translation.ko: 웰슬리 씨 사망 직전에 그 수표를 입금했더군요

translation.en: Was she really taking money from that poor old man all along?
translation.ko: 진짜로 그 불쌍한 노인분의 돈을 줄곧 갈취해 온 건가요?

translation.en: It's a good question.
Adam?
Adam!
Shit!
Ethan?
These were never cashed.
You okay?
I think I know who that is.
What?
Leonard said something about hiring a gardener.
translation.ko: 레너드 씨가 정원사를 고용했었단 말을 한 적이 있어

translation.en: I think I told you about this.
A guy named Ethan. This was a couple years ago.
translation.ko: 그 남자 이름이 이선이었고 2년 전쯤에 있었던 일이야

translation.en: So he's been up there for a while.
translation.ko: 그러면 그때부터 쭉 저기에 있었단 소리네

translation.en: There were checks made out to Ethan Doyle.
translation.ko: 이선 도일에게 발행된 수표가 여럿 있었어

translation.en: They were never cashed.
translation.ko: 한 번도 현금화된 게 아닌 거지

translation.en: Leonard said, one day, he just stopped showing up.
translation.ko: 레너드 씨 말로는 이선이 어느 날부턴가 그냥 안 나오더래

translation.en: Never heard from him again.
translation.ko: 그 후로 다시는 본 적이 없다고 했어

translation.en: Somebody shot him.
You looked?
He must have bled to death up there.
translation.ko: 그 위에서 출혈 과다로 죽은 게 확실해

translation.en: He was murdered.
Yeah. I think so.
But...
Leonard couldn't have known he was there.
translation.ko: 레너드 씨는 이선이 거기 있는 걸 몰랐을 거야

translation.en: Right? I mean, he would have helped him.
And why would Doyle hide out in the shed? Why not... come into the house?
translation.ko: 도일은 왜 창고에 숨어 있었을까? 대체 왜... 집 안으로 들어오지 않은 거지?

translation.en: Maybe these have something to do with it.
Take a guess.
Wow.
-Do you think they're real? -Why else would he hide them?
translation.ko: - 이거 진짜일까? - 아니라면 뭐 하러 숨겼겠어?

translation.en: Shit!
Here! Just--
-Oh, God! -Oh, my God.
Give them here. Come on.
-I'm sorry. -Dammit.
-Don't answer. -[Mr. Calvern] I saw your car.
translation.ko: - 문 열지 마 - 차 있는 거 봤어요

translation.en: But I can't. My car is parked outside. They know I'm here.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 내 차 밖에다 주차했거든 내가 안에 있는 거 다 알 거야

translation.en: -Okay, I'm just gonna... -I got it.
translation.ko: - 저기, 나는 잠깐... - 이건 내가 할게

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Open the door! Do you hear me? Katie!
translation.ko: 문 열어요! 내 말 안 들려요? 케이티!

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Katie, open the door please!
I'm sorry. This really isn't a good time.
Well, yeah. I'm sure you're very busy settling into your new home.
translation.ko: 네, 아무렴요 새 집 꾸미느라 엄청 바쁘겠죠

translation.en: You should be ashamed of yourself.
How could you take advantage of that poor man?
translation.ko: 어떻게 그런 불쌍한 노인을 등쳐먹을 수가 있어요, 케이티?

translation.en: -What? -Look, I knew something was up.
translation.ko: - 네? - 하여간 뭔 일 생길 것 같더라니

translation.en: I could feel it.
But you know what? You had him so frightened he couldn't even tell me.
translation.ko: 케이티가 너무 무서워서 그분이 나한테 말도 못 했던 거죠

translation.en: It's not-- No!
I'm not letting you tarnish my company's good name.
translation.ko: 케이티가 내 회사에 먹칠하게 놔두지 않을 거예요

translation.en: -Mr. Calvern-- -I'll find proof!
I'm gonna call the police!
-I'm gonna have you arrested! -This really isn't a good time.
translation.ko: - 케이티 당신 구속시킬 거라고! - 지금은 제발 가주세요

translation.en: [shouting] This isn't over, Katie!
I'll be back!
I'm gonna find out what's been going on in this house, one way or another!
translation.ko: 이 집에서 무슨 일이 있었는지 반드시 밝혀 내겠어요 내가 어떻게 해서든!

translation.en: I'm not letting this go! You hear me? I'm not gonna lose my business over this!
translation.ko: 난 이렇게는 못 넘어가요! 똑똑히 들어요! 이 일 때문에 내 사업을 말아 먹을 순 없다고!

translation.en: Why isn't this full?
[Adam] Katie?
[Adam] Hey, Katie!
Hey.
-Didn't you hear me? -Hi, sorry. I was making tea.
translation.ko: - 내 소리 못 들었어? - 어, 미안, 차 좀 끓이느라

translation.en: You want some?
No. I got you a present.
A new phone?
Yeah. Got one for each of us.
translation.ko: 맞아, 자기 거랑 내 거랑 각자 하나씩 샀어

translation.en: New numbers too. I figured the way things were going,
translation.ko: 번호도 새 거야 요즘 돌아가는 꼴을 보니

translation.en: we could both use a little privacy.
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 사생활이 없는 거 같아서

translation.en: We can't keep them.
-Katie-- -Adam, no.
There is a dead man out there. He was murdered.
translation.ko: 저기에 시체가 있잖아 살해당한 남자의 시체야

translation.en: He stole those diamonds.
And who knows what else he may have done, who he may have hurt.
translation.ko: 무슨 더 나쁜 짓을 했는지 사람을 여럿 해쳤는지도 몰라

translation.en: These things don't just go away like they never happened.
translation.ko: 이런 일은 절대 그냥 넘어갈 수 없어

translation.en: -The police must be looking for him. -Don't you get this?
translation.ko: - 경찰이 수배 중일 거야 - 상황 파악이 안 돼?

translation.en: Doyle stole the diamonds,
got himself shot, and then he died out there all by himself.
translation.ko: 그 후에 저기서 총을 맞고 혼자 죽은 거지

translation.en: It's like-- It's like he fell down a well.
Two years later,
nobody knows what happened to him or the diamonds. We can do whatever we want.
translation.ko: 그 남자와 다이아몬드의 행방을 아무도 몰라 우리 맘대로 하면 돼

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm calling Detective Chesler.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야? - 체슬러 수사관님에게 전화해서

translation.en: -We need to tell her-- -No! Wait!
translation.ko: - 다 밝히고... - 아니, 안 돼! 잠깐만!

translation.en: Wait, just-- Okay, hang on. Just listen to me for just a second.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 잠깐만 내 말 좀 들어 봐

translation.en: Okay, ask yourself. What the heck was Doyle doing here in the first place?
translation.ko: 자, 스스로에게 한번 물어 봐 애초에 도일이 여기 머물렀던 이유가 뭘까?

translation.en: Why take some crappy gardening job
translation.ko: 왜 이렇게 형편없는 정원 일을 하게 됐을까?

translation.en: if he's planning to steal a fortune in diamonds?
I don't know.
Some old guy's house digging up weeds
is the last place that anybody's gonna come looking for him.
translation.ko: 노인네 집에서 잡초를 뽑는 일꾼을 찾으러 오지는 않겠지

translation.en: I mean, think about it. Why else wouldn't he cash the checks?
translation.ko: 생각해 봐, 그 때문이 아니라면 왜 수표를 현금화하지 않았겠어?

translation.en: He didn't want to leave a paper trail.
translation.ko: 서류상 흔적을 남기고 싶지 않았던 거구나

translation.en: That way he sets up the big score.
translation.ko: 그러면 그로서는 큰 이득을 얻게 되지

translation.en: Nobody knows about this place and he can just hide here
translation.ko: 이곳에 대해 아는 사람이 없으니 자기가 필요한 만큼 오랫동안

translation.en: for as long as he needs to.
Although, I'm sure that getting shot and dying out there
translation.ko: 물론 자기가 저기에서 총 맞아 죽을 거란 생각은

translation.en: -was probably not a part of the plan. -That doesn't change anything.
translation.ko: - 전혀 못 했겠지만 말이야 - 그렇다 한들 달라지는 건 없어

translation.en: We can't keep those diamonds.
translation.ko: 우리가 저 다이아몬드를 가지는 건 안 돼

translation.en: All right, so what about the money?
What are we gonna do about that?
What do you mean?
If we do this, then the police put us under a microscope,
translation.ko: 우리가 신고하면 경찰이 우리를 꼼꼼하게 조사할 거고

translation.en: so how is that going to look?
We took the money from here and then we hid it in the bank.
translation.ko: 우리는 여기 있던 돈을 은행으로 가져가 숨겼어

translation.en: What are they gonna think?
We'll explain it to them.
Tell them it was Leonard's money, that it was his safety net.
translation.ko: 그 돈은 레너드 씨의 노후 자금이었다고

translation.en: All right, and then what?
'Cause you heard what the lawyer said. Even if they believe us,
translation.ko: 당신도 변호사 얘기 들었잖아 경찰이 우리를 믿어준다 해도

translation.en: even if we don't end up in jail, we could still lose this place.
translation.ko: 우리가 감옥에 가게 되는 건 아니라고 해도 이 집은 잃게 될지도 몰라

translation.en: We don't need this house, Adam!
translation.ko: 우리에게는 이 집 필요 없어, 애덤

translation.en: We don't need any of this.
Okay? As long as we have each other,
translation.ko: 안 그래? 우리가 서로 함께하는 한

translation.en: we're going to be all right.
All right?
I'm done with all right.
That's not enough anymore.
I told you. I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.ko: 내가 말했잖아, 난 예전 우리 삶으로 돌아가진 않을 거라고

translation.en: And what about that man out there? What are we supposed to do about that?
translation.ko: 그러면 저기 저 남자는 어떻게 해? 우리가 뭘 어떡해야 하는데?

translation.en: Pretend it never happened?
I'll take care of it.
How? How are you gonna do that?
This house
belongs to us now.
Okay, this is our future.
I'm not gonna let anybody take that away from us.
Look, everything is gonna be okay.
I'll take care of this for you.
[whispering] What are you doing?
[whispering] Someone's in the house.
[whispering] Where did you get that?
[whispering] Adam.
-[whispering] Don't. -[whispering] Don't move.
[whispering] We need to call 911.
Freeze, asshole!
Oh, my God.
Calvern.
How are you holding up, Katie?
Detective Chesler.
Hell of a thing.
It was an accident.
Yeah, that's what they're saying.
Either way, law says it's self-defense, so...
It still makes you wonder.
What was going through his head?
Why would he do something like that?
Just let himself into the house?
translation.ko: 뭐 하러 집 안에 들어온 걸까?

translation.en: I don't know.
Something had to set him off.
I know none of this is you, Katie.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨는 아무 잘못도 없는 거 알아요

translation.en: What?
Everything was fine around here until Adam started work.
translation.ko: 애덤 씨가 이 집에서 일 시작하기 전까지는 모든 게 평온했잖아요

translation.en: So you can tell me whatever is going on.
translation.ko: 그러니까 뭐가 어떻게 된 건지 나한테는 말해도 돼요

translation.en: I know that none of it is you.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨는 아무 잘못도 없다는 거 아니까요

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
I know about your money problems.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨가 금전 문제로 어려운 거 알아요

translation.en: I know what that does to people.
translation.ko: 그게 사람을 얼마나 힘들게 하는지도 알고요

translation.en: I know about the big check that you deposited from Mr. Wellsley.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨가 웰슬리 씨에게 큰 금액의 수표를 받아 입금한 것도 알죠

translation.en: You don't understand.
Okay, don't say anything, Katie. Just--
translation.ko: 아무 말도 하지 마요, 케이티 씨 그냥...

translation.en: Just listen for a second.
Because...
could be that...
it was a loan,
translation.ko: 빌려준 돈일 수도 있고 가지라고 준 돈일 수도 있고

translation.en: maybe it was a gift, who's to say?
translation.ko: 빌려준 돈일 수도 있고 가지라고 준 돈일 수도 있고 누군들 알겠어요?

translation.en: But I want you to put yourself in my shoes.
translation.ko: 하지만 내 입장에서 한번 생각해 봐요

translation.en: The big picture.
How all of a sudden, everything just drops in your lap.
translation.ko: 너무나 갑작스레 온갖 사건이 당신 주변에서 일어나요

translation.en: -I told you-- -I mean, here I am,
the coroner tells me that the old guy died in his sleep.
translation.ko: 검시관 말로는 노인이 자다가 돌아가신 거래요

translation.en: You tell me what his last wish was. And I figure, sure, why not?
translation.ko: 케이티 씨는 내게 그분의 마지막 소원이 뭔지 말했고요 그래서 난 그럴 수도 있겠다고 생각했죠

translation.en: But it is not until after he's cremated
that you find a will.
I didn't find it, I didn't even know about it.
translation.ko: 제가 찾은 게 아니에요 저는 유언장이 있는지조차 몰랐다고요

translation.en: And I don't even have a body.
I can't even prove that he didn't die a natural death.
translation.ko: 부검으로 그분의 자연사 여부를 밝힐 수도 없다고요

translation.en: I mean I gotta tell you, it's starting to keep me up at night.
translation.ko: 그런 생각 탓에 난 요즘 밤에 잠도 못 자요

translation.en: I would never hurt Leonard.
translation.ko: 난 절대로 레너드 씨를 해치지 않았어요

translation.en: I am not talking about you.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨 얘기를 하는 게 아니에요

translation.en: What?
Has Adam ever mentioned anyone by the name of Gaskin, a Ray Gaskin?
translation.ko: 애덤 씨가 레이 개스킨이란 이름을 언급한 적 있죠?

translation.en: I know that name.
'Cause he tried to rob the diner that night,
translation.ko: 그날 밤 그 식당을 털려던 강도 이름이죠

translation.en: and he also worked as a janitor at the university
translation.ko: 그 강도는 대학교의 관리 잡역부이기도 했어요

translation.en: while Adam was taking classes.
-No, that's not... No. -Okay.
It's a big school. Maybe they never met.
translation.ko: 큰 학교니까 서로 모르는 사이였을 수도 있죠

translation.en: But sooner or later...
Adam is going to screw up.
translation.ko: 애덤 씨가 다 망쳐 버릴 거예요

translation.en: It's only a matter of time.
Don't let him take you down with him.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨는 애덤 씨에게 휘말려 망하지 말아요

translation.en: You come to me.
Baby.
They wanna talk to you.
Hell of a thing.
-Katie! -Hey.
I heard what happened. Are you all right? I've been trying to call you.
translation.ko: 사건 얘기 들었어요, 괜찮아요? 전화를 여러 번 했는데...

translation.en: My number's been changed.
I need to talk to you.
-Yeah. Come upstairs. -Okay.
And this Detective Chesler, do you believe her?
translation.ko: 그 체슬러 수사관이란 분은 믿음이 가나요?

translation.en: Is it possible that Adam had anything to do
translation.ko: 추호라도 애덤 씨가 그날 밤 그 식당 강도 사건에

translation.en: with what happened at the diner that night?
I don't know what to believe.
Did Adam have any problems with Mr. Wellsley?
translation.ko: 애덤 씨가 웰슬리 씨와는 아무 문제 없었나요?

translation.en: -Any issues? -No.
No, nothing.
If the police suspect that Adam had anything to do with his death,
translation.ko: 경찰이 웰슬리 씨의 사망과 관련해 애덤 씨를 의심하게 된다면

translation.en: they'll try to find a motive.
They're gonna try to claim that he hurried things along.
translation.ko: 경찰은 애덤 씨가 일 처리를 서둘렀다고 주장하겠죠

translation.en: He hated being poor.
Okay, listen to me.
If Chesler thinks she can make a case, she's not gonna waste any time.
translation.ko: 체슬러 수사관은 사건 입증이 가능하다고 판단되는 즉시 움직일 거예요

translation.en: She's gonna try to get a warrant and search the house right away.
translation.ko: 영장을 발부 받아서 곧장 가택을 수사하겠죠

translation.en: Can she do that?
You need to be asking yourself, will she find anything?
translation.ko: 스스로에게 물어봐야죠 잡힐 만한 문제가 있을까요?

translation.en: You need to promise me.
Promise me
that you'll help Adam too.
It's gone.
What?
The money.
Adam must have taken it.
That's what you found? Cash?
Yeah...
in the attic.
We thought it was stolen at first but...
And then what changed your mind?
The diamonds.
So you found diamonds in the house?
In the living space above the garage.
Does Adam have these diamonds?
translation.ko: 그 다이아몬드는 애덤 씨가 갖고 있나요?

translation.en: Yeah.
You need to stop him.
What? Why?
He knows you suspect something. That's why he took the money.
translation.ko: 애덤 씨는 케이티 씨가 자기를 의심하는 걸 알고 이 돈을 가져간 거예요

translation.en: He disappears and throws you to the cops.
translation.ko: 케이티 씨에게 시체를 떠밀고 자기는 종적을 감추겠죠

translation.en: No, Adam would never do that.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 애덤은 절대로 그럴 리가 없어요

translation.en: Are you sure?
You need to find him, bring him to the house and then call me.
translation.ko: 애덤 씨를 찾아서 집으로 데리고 들어간 후에 나한테 연락 줘요

translation.en: -You're not coming with me? -I need to hold off Detective Chesler.
translation.ko: - 나랑 같이 가지 그래요? - 난 체슬러 수사관을 막아야 해요

translation.en: I don't want her serving the search warrant
till we know Adam's in the house.
-Detective Chesler. -Detective Johnson.
What have we got?
Garbage truck was making its rounds this morning, called it in.
translation.ko: 오늘 아침에 돌던 쓰레기 트럭에서 신고가 들어왔어요

translation.en: -How long's he been in there? -ME's still en route.
translation.ko: - 얼마나 오래된 거죠? - 사체 검안은 아직이에요

translation.en: You beat him here.
Damn.
Why did you call me?
There was a backpack next to the vic.
Inside we found an old laundry receipt.
translation.ko: 그 안에서 오래전 세탁소 영수증이 발견됐어요

translation.en: It's pretty faded, but...
the address matches the name from one of your cases.
translation.ko: 적힌 주소가 수사관님의 사건 인물 중 하나와 동일해요

translation.en: What's the name?
Leonard Wellsley.
Come on, Adam, pick up.
-Where've you been? -Adam!
I'm up half the night talking to the cops.
translation.ko: 경찰이랑 통화하느라 밤중에 절반은 깨어 있었는데

translation.en: I wake up in the morning, you're already gone.
translation.ko: 아침에 일어나 보니 당신은 이미 나갔더라고

translation.en: There's no note. You haven't answered your phone all day.
translation.ko: 메모도 안 남기고 온종일 전화도 안 받고

translation.en: -Where've you been, Katie? -The bank.
That's one of the things I need to talk to you about.
translation.ko: 내가 그 얘기도 하려고 그렇게나 전화했던 건데

translation.en: -Why did you take the money? -Cause we're in a lot of trouble.
translation.ko: - 돈은 왜 가져갔어? - 우리가 큰 곤경에 빠졌으니까

translation.en: Checked up on that real estate agent, Hayden.
translation.ko: 그 헤이든이란 부동산 중개업자에 대해 알아봤는데

translation.en: I mean, what's this guy's deal?
Why's he so interested in selling this particular house?
translation.ko: 왜 하필 꼭 이 집을 사려고 그렇게 열을 올릴까?

translation.en: Guess what?
There's no record of a Mickey Hayden getting a real estate license.
translation.ko: 공인 중개사 목록에 미키 헤이든이라는 이름은 없더라

translation.en: -What? -Yeah. He just got released from prison.
translation.ko: - 정말? - 그래, 이제 막 출소한 놈이었어

translation.en: Did a couple years for robbing a jewelry store.
Jewelry?
One of those spots downtown. Doesn't even use a gun.
translation.ko: 시내 보석상 중 하나를 총도 안 쏘고 털었대

translation.en: He just sweet talks his way through the security door,
translation.ko: 번지르르한 화술만으로 보안 검색을 통과한 다음에

translation.en: then he blindsides the armed guard,
does some old school, like, smash-and-grab.
Sixty seconds, comes out with three million dollars
in loose diamonds that were never recovered.
-That's why he was here. -Hang on, it gets better.
translation.ko: - 그래서 여기 있었던 거구나 - 더 들어 봐, 아주 가관이니까

translation.en: Cops think that he had an accomplice that they never found.
translation.ko: 경찰 소견으로는 절대 찾지 못한 공범이 하나 있었던 거 같대

translation.en: You wanna take a wild guess?
translation.ko: 어떻게 된 건지 한번 맞혀 볼래?

translation.en: This other guy gets shot during the burglary, then he gets away.
translation.ko: 강도질하던 중에 다른 한 놈은 총을 맞고 달아났대

translation.en: Doyle got away with the diamonds.
And...
there's only one other person who could've known about it.
translation.ko: 그걸 아는 사람은 오직 단 한 명뿐이야

translation.en: The one who shot him.
Hayden.
This bastard didn't bother to use a fake name. What did he think?
translation.ko: 뭔 생각이었는지 그 망할 놈은 가명조차 쓰지 않았어

translation.en: We weren't smart enough to figure it out?
translation.ko: 우리가 그런 것도 못 알아챌 똥멍청이로 보였나?

translation.en: We have to call the police.
No, the only thing that we need to do is get the hell out of Dodge.
translation.ko: 아니지, 우리가 할 일은 딱 하나뿐이야 감쪽같이 자취를 감추는 거

translation.en: We got plenty of travel money, so...
сan you go pack some stuff up real fast?
translation.ko: 당신도 최대한 빨리 짐 좀 꾸려

translation.en: I'm gonna go get cleaned up.
You were never gonna leave me.
What? No, why would I ever leave you?
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야? 내가 왜 당신을 버려?

translation.en: Get changed.
Hi, Julia.
It's Katie.
Yeah, he's here, but...
listen, it wasn't him.
Where are they?
I don't know.
Call him out here.
Adam?
Adam?
Adam!
Right here, baby.
Let her go.
Look, I just want the diamonds.
I said let her go.
I've been waiting a long time for this.
translation.ko: 난 이 순간을 아주 오래 기다렸어

translation.en: So how about you just tell me where they are?
Some place you're never gonna find them.
translation.ko: 네가 결코 찾지 못할 곳에 뒀지

translation.en: Are you gonna shoot me, kid?
That's right.
'Cause if I just give you the diamonds, you'll shoot both of us.
translation.ko: 내가 다이아몬드를 넘기면 네놈은 우리 둘 다 쏠 테니까

translation.en: Here's the thing though.
Even if you hit me from there...
my gun's gonna go off, and it's gonna blow a hole in her the size of your head.
translation.ko: 내 총은 발사될 거고 그러면 네 아내에게 네 머리통만한 구멍이 뚫릴걸

translation.en: And we don't want that now, do we?
translation.ko: 그런 상황은 만들지 말아야지 안 그래?

translation.en: So, let's just talk about this.
Adam!
Son of a bitch.
Adam!
No!
Adam!
Baby...
Adam!
Baby!
Please.
Adam.
...in the garden.
Stay with me, baby.
Katie.
Oh, my God.
Here, Katie.
I'm sorry.
Here, sit.
Hey.
Katie, listen.
We need to look for the diamonds before the police get here.
translation.ko: 경찰이 오기 전에 다이아몬드를 찾아야 해요

translation.en: Do you understand?
It's the only way we can explain what happened without implicating you.
translation.ko: 그래야만 케이티 씨가 이 사건에 연루되지 않았단 걸 증명할 수 있으니까요

translation.en: -Adam never would have hurt Leonard. -Katie, the diamonds.
translation.ko: 애덤은 레너드 씨를 해쳤을 리가 없는데... 케이티 씨, 다이아몬드요

translation.en: How could I have ever thought that?
It was Hayden.
Hayden...
killed him with an overdose.
He read the logbook, the one I kept for Leonard's medication.
translation.ko: 내가 기록하던 레너드 씨의 약물 복용 일지를 보고...

translation.en: I found the empty pill bottle.
How do you know it was Hayden?
Leonard used to tell me all the time that he could hear someone in the house,
translation.ko: 레너드 씨가 집 안에서 누군가 돌아다니는 소리가 항상 들린다고 했어요

translation.en: but I never-- I...
It was Hayden.
Looking for the diamonds.
-He couldn't find them. -But you did?
translation.ko: - 끝내 찾지 못했지만요 - 케이티 씨는 찾았죠?

translation.en: I don't understand.
Why did Hayden shoot Doyle?
translation.ko: 헤이든은 대체 왜 도일에게 총을 쐈을까요?

translation.en: Why didn't-- Why didn't he end up with the diamonds?
translation.ko: 어쩌다 그 남자가... 다이아몬드를 갖게 된 거죠?

translation.en: Because he wasn't half as smart as he wanted you to think.
translation.ko: 그다지 똑똑한 놈은 아니었으니까 일이 그렇게 됐겠죠

translation.en: I mean how smart do you have to be to decide to rip off your partner,
translation.ko: 그러니까 내 말은 공범인 자기 파트너를 속이고 경찰이 몰려드는 판에 파트너에게 총을 쏘고도

translation.en: shoot him while the cops are rolling up,
translation.ko: 경찰이 몰려드는 판에 파트너에게 총을 쏘고도 3백만 달러어치 다이아몬드까지 챙겨서 도망가려면

translation.en: and he still gets away with three million dollars in diamonds?
translation.ko: 3백만 달러어치 다이아몬드까지 챙겨서 도망가려면 엄청나게 똑똑해야 하지 않겠어요?

translation.en: Meanwhile, you get busted and spend two years in prison.
translation.ko: 게다가 2년 동안이나 감옥에 갇혀 썩어 지냈잖아요

translation.en: I never told you how much the diamonds are worth.
translation.ko: 난 다이아몬드의 가치를 언급한 적은 없는데...

translation.en: Oops.
-What are you doing? -Look, okay, I paid my dues.
translation.ko: - 무슨 짓이에요? - 그게, 난 최선을 다했어요

translation.en: Okay, I spent ten years as a public defender.
How do you think I got Hayden's case?
translation.ko: 내가 헤이든 선임료로 얼마 받았는지 알아요?

translation.en: I knew he was an idiot.
But I believed his story.
And we had an agreement, an understanding, and, of course, he messes everything up.
translation.ko: 우리는 합의하에 이해관계를 맺었지만 너무 뻔하게도 이놈이 다 망쳐 버렸죠

translation.en: I plea bargained his charges down to two years.
translation.ko: 난 사전형량제도를 통해 이놈의 양형을 2년으로 낮췄어요

translation.en: I traced Doyle back to when he worked for Leonard.
translation.ko: 도일이 레너드 씨 집에서 일했다는 것까진 추적해 냈는데

translation.en: But the only thing that I couldn't figure out
translation.ko: 내가 알아내지 못했던 단 한 가지는

translation.en: was where he was.
Turns out Doyle was dead.
You helped kill Leonard?
No, I had nothing to do with that, okay? That was all Hayden. He got impatient.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 난 그 사건과는 무관해요 그건 다 헤이든이 저지른 짓이죠 마음이 조급해져서는

translation.en: He wanted to hurry things along, but I did have to do some fast maneuvering
translation.ko: 일을 서두르려 하길래 나로서는 헤이든을 덮어 주기 위해

translation.en: to cover up for him.
The will.
It isn't real, is it?
It's real enough.
With no one to contest it, what's the difference?
translation.ko: 이의 제기할 사람이 없으니 아무런 차이가 없죠

translation.en: Look, I'm sure Leonard would've given you the house if he was alive,
translation.ko: 레너드 씨가 살아 있었다면 케이티 씨에게 주고 싶어 했을걸요

translation.en: but that is beside the point.
Right now, I need you to tell me where the diamonds are.
translation.ko: 지금 중요한 건 다이아몬드가 어디 있느냐는 거죠

translation.en: I don't know.
Katie.
Adam hid them.
I really don't know where they are.
But I wouldn't tell you if I did.
translation.ko: 하지만 알았다 해도 댁한테는 말하지 않았겠죠

translation.en: You know, that's what I really liked about you.
translation.ko: 난 케이티 씨의 그런 면이 참 좋았어요

translation.en: -[cocks gun] -It was never about the money.
But I'm sure they'll turn up.
These things always do.
-Katie? -Detective!
I'm Julia Byron-Kim.
I'm Ms. Franklin's attorney.
Well, Ms. Byron-Kim,
I'm gonna need you to step out so I can see both your hands.
translation.ko: 뒤로 물러서서 손바닥이 보이게 양손을 올려요

translation.en: If you just give me a minute to explain on behalf of my client.
translation.ko: 저희 고객을 대신해 잠시 말씀드릴 게 있는데요

translation.en: Show me your hands. Right now!
All right.
-Detective, if you would just listen-- -Look out!
Stay back.
Are you okay?
Are you okay?
You're okay, sweetie. You're okay.
Come on.
Come on. Let's get you out of here, come on.
This is Detective Chesler.
I'm requesting a back-up and an ambulance
at 127 Queens.
FOUR MONTHS LATER
Katie.
-Hey. -Detective.
Sorry, I tried knocking.
Sorry, I was...
a million miles away.
A young cedar.
This is a nice spot.
-Lots of sun. -Yeah, I think so.
translation.ko: - 볕이 잘 드는 곳이에요 - 네, 그렇죠

translation.en: -It's good to see you. -And it's good to see you.
translation.ko: - 와주셔서 감사해요 - 얼굴 보니 나도 좋네요

translation.en: You look beautiful.
Thank you.
Yeah, we're...
We're doing well.
Well I just came by to let you know that the case is officially closed.
translation.ko: 사건에 대한 수사가 공식적으로 종료됐단 소식을 전하러 들렀어요

translation.en: Mickey Hayden and Julia Byron-Kim are the only suspects on record.
translation.ko: 기록상 피의자는 미키 헤이든과 줄리아 바이런-킴뿐이에요

translation.en: So your baby won't grow up to someday find out
translation.ko: 그러니까 케이티 씨의 아기가 자라서 어느 날 자기 아버지의

translation.en: her father had a criminal history.
translation.ko: 범죄 기록을 알게 돼 놀랄 일은 없겠죠

translation.en: Thank you, Detective.
We've been through that place a half a dozen times,
top to bottom.
Still can't figure it out.
He didn't tell me.
I really don't know where Adam hid the diamonds.
translation.ko: 애덤이 어디에 다이아몬드를 숨겼는지 저는 정말 몰라요

translation.en: I'm sorry, though. I wish I did.
Take care of yourself, Katie.
You too.
♪ And I'll be standing next to you ♪
